features.name: Admin Events Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Main event analytics dashboard with comprehensive statistics and navigation

features.name: Event Management Hub
features.description: Central management interface for individual events with navigation to all event features

features.name: Event Media Management
features.description: Upload, manage, and organize event images, videos, and documents

features.name: Ticket Types Management
features.description: Create, edit, and manage different ticket types with pricing and availability

features.name: Event Performers Management
features.description: Manage featured performers, artists, and their details for events

features.name: Event Sponsors Management
features.description: Manage event sponsors, partnerships, and sponsor assignments

features.name: Event Contacts Management
features.description: Manage event contact persons with name, phone, and email information

features.name: Event Emails Management
features.description: Manage event-related email communications and templates

features.name: Program Directors Management
features.description: Manage event program directors and leadership team

features.name: Event Tickets List
features.description: View and manage individual event tickets and registrations

features.name: Event Registration Management
features.description: Comprehensive registration management system with search, filter, and export capabilities

features.name: New Event Creation
features.description: Create new events with complete setup wizard and form validation

features.name: Event Settings Management
features.description: Global event settings and configuration management

features.name: Event Reports & Analytics
features.description: Generate reports and analytics for event performance and registration data

features.name: Admin Navigation System
features.description: Main admin navigation component with role-based access and responsive design

features.name: Data Table Component
features.description: Reusable data table with sorting, pagination, and CRUD operations

features.name: Modal Components
features.description: Modal system for forms, confirmations, and detailed views

features.name: Event Management API Proxy
features.description: API proxy handlers for secure backend communication with JWT authentication

features.name: Authentication & Security
features.description: JWT-based authentication system with multi-tenant support and secure API calls

features.name: Type Definitions
features.description: Comprehensive TypeScript interfaces and DTOs for all event-related entities
